verses.verse: וַיְהִ֧י <S%H1961><s%> had been אֲרוֹן־ <S%H727><s%> And the ark יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בִּשְׂדֵ֥ה <S%H7704><s%> was in the country פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines שִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7651><s%> seven חֳדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H2320><s%> months

וַיִּקְרְא֣וּ <S%H7121><s%> called פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines לַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <S%H3548><s%> for the priests וְלַקֹּֽסְמִים֙ <S%H7080><s%> and the diviners לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What נַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> What shall we do לַאֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> to the ark יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah הוֹדִעֻ֕נוּ <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge בַּמֶּ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> how נְשַׁלְּחֶ֥נּוּ <S%H7971><s%> us wherewith we shall send לִמְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> it to his place

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> If מְשַׁלְּחִ֞ים <S%H7971><s%> If ye send away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֨וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תְּשַׁלְּח֤וּ <S%H7971><s%> send אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> רֵיקָ֔ם <S%H7387><s%> it not empty כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָשֵׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> but in any wise תָּשִׁ֛יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> return ל֖וֹ אָשָׁ֑ם <S%H817><s%> him a trespass offering אָ֤ז <S%H227><s%> Then תֵּרָֽפְאוּ֙ <S%H7495><s%> then ye shall be healed וְנוֹדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> and it shall be known לָכֶ֔ם לָ֛מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not תָס֥וּר <S%H5493><s%> is not removed יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> to you why his hand מִכֶּֽם׃ <S%H4480><s%> they

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> Then said מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What הָאָשָׁם֮ <S%H817><s%> they What [shall be] the trespass offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> which we shall return לוֹ֒ וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> to him? They answered מִסְפַּר֙ <S%H4557><s%> [according to] the number סַרְנֵ֣י <S%H5633><s%> of the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines חֲמִשָּׁה֙ <S%H2568><s%> Five [עָפְלֵי כ] (טְחֹרֵ֣י <S%H6076><s%> stronghold ק) זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> golden וַחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H2568><s%> and five עַכְבְּרֵ֣י <S%H5909><s%> mice זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> golden כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מַגֵּפָ֥ה <S%H4046><s%> plague אַחַ֛ת <S%H259><s%> for one לְכֻלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> all וּלְסַרְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5633><s%> [was] on you all and on your lords

וַעֲשִׂיתֶם֩ <S%H6213><s%> Wherefore ye shall make צַלְמֵ֨י <S%H6754><s%> images [עָפְלֵיכֶם כ] (טְחֹרֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H6076><s%> stronghold ק) וְצַלְמֵ֣י <S%H6754><s%> and images עַכְבְּרֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H5909><s%> of your mice הַמַּשְׁחִיתִם֙ <S%H7843><s%> that mar אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וּנְתַתֶּ֛ם <S%H5414><s%> and ye shall give לֵאלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> unto the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כָּב֑וֹד <S%H3519><s%> glory אוּלַ֗י <S%H194><s%> perhaps יָקֵ֤ל <S%H7043><s%> peradventure he will lighten אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> his hand מֵֽעֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and וּמֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> from off you and from off your gods וּמֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and אַרְצְכֶֽם׃ <S%H776><s%> and from off your land

וְלָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תְכַבְּדוּ֙ <S%H3513><s%> Wherefore then do ye harden אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְבַבְכֶ֔ם <S%H3824><s%> your hearts כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> after כִּבְּד֛וּ <S%H3513><s%> hardened מִצְרַ֥יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian וּפַרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> and Pharaoh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> care for הֲלוֹא֙ <S%H3808><s%> not כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he הִתְעַלֵּ֣ל <S%H5953><s%> had severely בָּהֶ֔ם וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֖וּם <S%H7971><s%> among them did they not let the people go וַיֵּלֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> along

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now קְח֨וּ <S%H3947><s%> and take וַעֲשׂ֜וּ <S%H6213><s%> Now therefore make עֲגָלָ֤ה <S%H5699><s%> cart חֲדָשָׁה֙ <S%H2319><s%> new אֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> a וּשְׁתֵּ֤י <S%H8147><s%> two פָרוֹת֙ <S%H6510><s%> kine עָל֔וֹת <S%H5763><s%> milch אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has never עָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> on which there hath come עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and עֹ֑ל <S%H5923><s%> no yoke וַאֲסַרְתֶּ֤ם <S%H631><s%> and tie אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּרוֹת֙ <S%H6510><s%> the kine בָּעֲגָלָ֔ה <S%H5699><s%> to the cart וַהֲשֵׁיבֹתֶ֧ם <S%H7725><s%> and bring בְּנֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H1121><s%> their calves מֵאַחֲרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H310><s%> from them הַבָּֽיְתָה׃ <S%H1004><s%> home

וּלְקַחְתֶּ֞ם <S%H3947><s%> And take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּנְתַתֶּ֤ם <S%H5414><s%> and lay אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הָ֣עֲגָלָ֔ה <S%H5699><s%> it upon the cart וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> the jewels הַזָּהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הֲשֵׁבֹתֶ֥ם <S%H7725><s%> which ye return לוֹ֙ אָשָׁ֔ם <S%H817><s%> him [for] a trespass offering תָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> and put בָאַרְגַּ֖ז <S%H712><s%> in a coffer מִצִּדּ֑וֹ <S%H6654><s%> by the side וְשִׁלַּחְתֶּ֥ם <S%H7971><s%> thereof and send it away אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְהָלָֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> that it may go

וּרְאִיתֶ֗ם <S%H7200><s%> And see אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if דֶּ֨רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way גְּבוּל֤וֹ <S%H1366><s%> of his own coast יַֽעֲלֶה֙ <S%H5927><s%> if it goeth up בֵּ֣ית שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> to Bethshemesh ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> He עָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> [then] he hath done לָ֔נוּ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָעָ֥ה <S%H7451><s%> evil הַגְּדוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> us this great הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> But וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> not וְיָדַ֙עְנוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> but if not then we shall know כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> that [it is] not his hand נָ֣גְעָה <S%H5060><s%> [that] smote בָּ֔נוּ מִקְרֶ֥ה <S%H4745><s%> us it [was] a chance ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> it הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> [that] happened to us לָֽנוּ׃

וַיַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> did so הָאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H376><s%> the men כֵּ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> so וַיִּקְח֗וּ <S%H3947><s%> and took שְׁתֵּ֤י <S%H8147><s%> two פָרוֹת֙ <S%H6510><s%> kine עָל֔וֹת <S%H5763><s%> milch וַיַּאַסְר֖וּם <S%H631><s%> and tied בָּעֲגָלָ֑ה <S%H5699><s%> them to the cart וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> their calves כָּל֥וּ <S%H3607><s%> and shut up בַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> at home

וַיָּשִׂ֛מוּ <S%H7760><s%> And they laid אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הָעֲגָלָ֑ה <S%H5699><s%> upon the cart וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> הָאַרְגַּ֗ז <S%H712><s%> and the coffer וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> עַכְבְּרֵ֣י <S%H5909><s%> with the mice הַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> צַלְמֵ֥י <S%H6754><s%> and the images טְחֹרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H2914><s%> of their emerods

וַיִשַּׁ֨רְנָה <S%H3474><s%> took the straight הַפָּר֜וֹת <S%H6510><s%> And the kine בַּדֶּ֗רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> way עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in דֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> to the way בֵּ֣ית שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> of Bethshemesh בִּמְסִלָּ֣ה <S%H4546><s%> the highway אַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> they הָלְכ֤וּ <S%H1980><s%> [and] went along הָלֹךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> as they went וְגָע֔וֹ <S%H1600><s%> lowing וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not סָ֖רוּ <S%H5493><s%> and turned not aside יָמִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> [to] the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֑אול <S%H8040><s%> or [to] the left וְסַרְנֵ֤י <S%H5633><s%> and the lords פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines הֹלְכִ֣ים <S%H1980><s%> went אַחֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H310><s%> after עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> them גְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> them unto the border בֵּ֥ית שָֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H1053><s%> of Bethshemesh

וּבֵ֣ית שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> And [they of] Bethshemesh קֹצְרִ֥ים <S%H7114><s%> [were] reaping קְצִיר־ <S%H7105><s%> harvest חִטִּ֖ים <S%H2406><s%> their wheat בָּעֵ֑מֶק <S%H6010><s%> in the valley וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> and they lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5869><s%> their eyes וַיִּרְאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אָר֔וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark וַֽיִּשְׂמְח֖וּ <S%H8055><s%> and rejoiced לִרְאֽוֹת׃ <S%H7200><s%> to see

וְהָעֲגָלָ֡ה <S%H5699><s%> And the cart בָּ֠אָה <S%H935><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into שְׂדֵ֨ה <S%H7704><s%> into the field יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <S%H3091><s%> of Joshua בֵּֽית־ הַשִּׁמְשִׁי֙ <S%H1030><s%> a Bethshemite וַתַּעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there וְשָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> where אֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone גְּדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> there where [there was] a great וַֽיְבַקְּעוּ֙ <S%H1234><s%> and they clave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> the wood הָעֲגָלָ֔ה <S%H5699><s%> of the cart וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֨פָּר֔וֹת <S%H6510><s%> the kine הֶעֱל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> and offered עֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> a burnt offering לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD ס

וְהַלְוִיִּ֞ם <S%H3881><s%> And the Levites הוֹרִ֣ידוּ ׀ <S%H3381><s%> took down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַרְגַּ֤ז <S%H712><s%> and the coffer אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> in אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בּ֣וֹ כְלֵֽי־ <S%H3627><s%> that [was] with it wherein the jewels זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וַיָּשִׂ֖מוּ <S%H7760><s%> [were] and put אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone הַגְּדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> [them] on the great וְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> and the men בֵֽית־ שֶׁ֗מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> of Bethshemesh הֶעֱל֨וּ <S%H5927><s%> offered עֹל֜וֹת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings וַֽיִּזְבְּח֧וּ <S%H2076><s%> and sacrificed זְבָחִ֛ים <S%H2077><s%> sacrifices בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the same day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD
